commands.name: prettier
commands.summary: Used by the pre-commit Git hook. Invokes Prettier to reformat staged changes.

commands.name: lint
commands.summary: Runs eslint with --fix on all TypesScript files.

commands.name: upgrade
commands.summary: Upgrades all project package.json files to latest versions.

commands.name: lint:sort
commands.summary: Sorts all project package.json files alphabetically.

commands.name: barrels
commands.summary: Runs barrelsby to generate barrel export index files.

commands.name: clean
commands.summary: Uses Heft to clean all compiler caches.

commands.name: circular
commands.summary: Check for circular dependencies with dpdm.

commands.name: test
commands.summary: Run tests on all packages with ava.

commands.name: coverage
commands.summary: Run test coverage reports on all packages with c8.
